SELECT DISTINCT t1.COURSE_ID_ courseId, t3.COURSE_CODE_ courseCode, t3.COURSE_NAME_ courseName, t3.COURSE_NAME_EN_ courseNameEn, t3.TRAINING_LEVEL_ trainingLevel, t3.CREDITS_ credits FROM elc_affinity_courses_t t1 JOIN course_t t2 ON t1.COURSE_ID_ = t2.ID_ JOIN course_open_t t3 ON ( t2.CODE_ = t3.COURSE_CODE_ AND t3.IS_OPEN_ = 1 )
and t2.COURSE_CODE_ like concat('%',#{courseCode},'%')
and t2.COURSE_NAME_ like concat('%',#{courseName},'%')
